mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin (id, password, name ) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM admin WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password}

SELECT sum(transaction_price) as sales_amount, COUNT(*) as sales_count, TO_CHAR(date, 'MM-dd') as daily_chart FROM (select * from transactionhistory WHERE status='상품 배송 완료' and TO_CHAR(date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') between #{start_date} and #{end_date}) as a GROUP BY TO_CHAR(date, 'MM-dd') ORDER BY daily_chart;

SELECT sum(o.transaction_price) as sales_amount, COUNT(*) as sales_count, TO_CHAR(date, 'MM-dd') as daily_chart 'yy-MM') as month_chart 'YYYY') as year_chart
FROM transactionhistory as o WHERE 1=1 and status='상품 배송 완료' and TO_CHAR(date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') between #{start_date} and #{end_date}
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(date, 'MM-dd') 'yy-MM') 'YYYY')
ORDER BY daily_chart month_chart year_chart
